name.ja: <ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>華<rt>げ</rt></ruby><ruby>襲<rt>しゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>焉<rt>えん</rt></ruby>

text.en: Your opponent cannot target "Ryu-Ge" monsters you control with card effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ryu-Ge Ruin" once per turn. If you have a "Ryu-Ge" Pendulum Monster in your field or face-up Extra Deck: You can shuffle 2 "Ryu-Ge" monsters from your hand, GY, and/or banishment into the Deck, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy it. If this card is destroyed: You can Set 1 non-Continuous "Ryu-Ge" Trap from your Deck, GY, or banishment.
